dl.dd: Type: one of the values below
Used to indicate whether multiple selection is allowed.

ul.li: single: Only one row may be selected at a time. (Default in listbox and richlistbox.)
multiple: Multiple rows may be selected at once. (Default in tree.)

dd.p: For trees, you can also use the following values:

ul.li: cell: Individual cells can be selected template.fx_minversion_inline(3)
text: Rows are selected; however, the selection highlight appears only over the text of the primary column.

dd.p: For richlistbox, this is new in Firefox 3.5.
